law.catch_line: Certain railroad property to be considered roads -- Use of funds for maintenance and repair.
law.text: For the purposes of this chapter and KRS Chapter 178 on and after July 1, 2010, railroad crossings, railroad spurs that access industrial parks, and shortline railroads at or near intersections with roadways shall be considered roads. The industrial access road fund within the Transportation Cabinet and other funds specified by the secretary or requested by the secretary of the Cabinet for Economic Development may be used for their maintenance and repair.
law.history: Created 2009 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 54, effective June 26, 2009.
